home.about: [Slyv on the ethernet] I love programming and design.

project_list.title: Dark Amoled Theme for Arch Linux with Hyprland
project_list.description: A sleek collection of dotfiles crafted for Arch Linux, my love letter for AMOLED aesthetics.

project_list.title: Lively Captions - Translate and Caption in Real-Time for desktop
project_list.description: Lively Captions is a real-time speech transcription and translation desktop app built with Python. It captures your voice through a microphone or your computer audio, transcribes it using Whisper, and and also translates it into other languages.

project_list.title: Ñawi mobile app and web
project_list.description: A managment application for students reports developed for android and web.

project_list.title: Minimal Windows Terminal Configuration Script
project_list.description: A minimal powershell script to configure Windows Terminal with a custom theme, font, and settings.

project_list.title: They are watching (Game)
project_list.description: A short demo game made in Godot made in collaboration with StraGeo Studios for Brackeys GameJam 2025 - 1.

project_list.title: Movie-fy
project_list.description: A simple movie searching app with TMDB API consumption.

project_list.title: UnixPec
project_list.description: A minimal opinionated application made with Java for daily tasks organization.

project_list.title: Map-ly
project_list.description: A demo map application for marking danger areas signaling dangerous areas from reliable fonts.
